page.title: 06Activities in Eccleshall
page.content: Eccleshall's clubs are very well supp- orted. Football, rugby, cricket, tennis and badminton are followed keen ly by participants and spectators. Eccleshall Singers, Eccleshall Players the Lady Handbell Ringers and church bellringers meet and entertain regul- arly. There is a Women's Institute, Mothers' Union, Housewives' Register and Young Wives Group; and for young people Scouts, Guides, a Young Farmers association and church youth clubs. As well as a Sports and Amenities Assoc- iation and an Allotments Association, the Red Cross and British Legion are popular and do excellent work. A great deal is done for the elderly by the Round Table and the Happy Circle. Ecc- leshall is linked with French town of {Sancerre,}and family exchanges are arranged by the Twinning Committee.
